010package imagingbook.common.color.statistics;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012
013import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
014
015/**
016 * Defines static methods for calculating statistics of color images.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 *
020 */
021public abstract class ColorStatistics {
022        
023        private ColorStatistics() {}
024        
025        /**
026         * Determines how many different colors are contained in the specified
027         * 24 bit full-color RGB image.
028         * 
029         * @param cp a RGB image
030         * @return the number of distinct colors
031         */
032        public static int countColors(ColorProcessor cp) { 
033                // duplicate pixel array and sort
034                int[] pixels = (int[]) cp.getPixelsCopy();
035                Arrays.sort(pixels);  
036                
037                int k = 1;      // image contains at least one color
038                for (int i = 0; i < pixels.length - 1; i++) {
039                        if (pixels[i] != pixels[i + 1])
040                                k = k + 1;
041                }
042                return k;
043        }
044
045}
